channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Disney+ and Hulu deal: Get one month of the bundle for only $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: How YC-backed Bucket Robotics survived its first CES
item.description: Now, the startup is turning its attention to building the business, fundraising and striking commercial deals.

item.title: Ready to ditch Windows for Linux in 2026? Tuxedo's new ultraslim business workstations could be just the ticket, and weigh less than a small cat
item.description: Tuxedo’s InfinityBook Max 16 is a compact Linux mini workstation offering Intel Core Ultra 9, RTX graphics, OLED display, and extensive connectivity.

item.title: Morocco vs Senegal Free Streams: How to watch 2025 AFCON Final from anywhere in the world
item.description: How to watch 2025/26 AFCON final live streams online, with Brahim Diaz and Sadio Mane set to light up the title-deciding Morocco vs Senegal clash in Rabat.

item.title: The Ninth ‘Stranger Things’ Episode Exists…on ‘SNL’
item.description: Love it or hate it, the 'SNL' version of the 'Stranger Things' secret ending probably isn't far off from what it'd actually be like.

item.title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
item.description: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.

item.title: Amazon just launched a mega Super Bowl TV sale — here are 11 deals I recommend from Samsung, Sony, and LG
item.description: Amazon has launched a huge Super Bowl TV sale, and I'm rounding up 11 deals that I'd recommend buying, including record-low prices from Samsung, LG, Sony, and more.

item.title: How to watch Senegal vs. Morocco online for free
item.description: How to watch Africa Cup of Nations for free. Live stream Senegal vs. Morocco in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations final for free.

item.title: « Il manque quelque chose en dessous de la C3 » : on a discuté avec le patron de Citroën de ses projets de voitures électriques ultra-abordables
item.description: Outre l'abandon du « tout-électrique » en 2035, la Commission européenne a ouvert la voie à une nouvelle catégorie de voitures électriques bien plus abordables qu'aujourd'hui. Un marché qui intéresse fortement Citroën, comme nous l'a confirmé son nouveau PDG, Xavier Chardon, lors d'un entretien.

item.title: Passwords are still a problem for UK businesses - what next?
item.description: The challenge for British security leaders is no longer whether NCSC guidance on credential management is sound, but how to operationalize it effectively.

item.title: Got a Nespresso machine? You need to try these 3 delicious coffee pods right now – while you still can
item.description: Add these three exciting flavours to your next order – you won't regret it.

item.title: This is the year of wireless speakers as design pieces — here are 6 I loved from CES 2026 and can't wait to hear more about

item.title: La manette BackBone One Gen 2 version Lightning est à moitié prix pendant les soldes
item.description: Vous jouez sur iPhone et vous êtes encore branché au port Lightning ? La Backbone One Gen 2 édition PlayStation profite de la seconde démarque des soldes avec une remise de plus de 50 %, faisant chuter son prix de 120,99 euros à 57,59 euros à la Fnac.
